title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, August 15, 1863
summary: Hotchkiss describes travelling over the countryside, making a map. He writes of Sunday in camp, and the lack of battle activity at present.
keywords: Women, Family, African Americans, Slavery, Military Authority, Home Front, Church/Religious Activity, Agriculture, Enlistment, National Government, Camp Life, American Civil War
